text: Imre Földi (8 May 1938 - 23 April 2017) was a Hungarian weightlifter. Competing at a record of five Olympic Games, he won a gold medal in 1972 and silver medals in 1964 and 1968. During his career he set 21 world records, and after his retirement he coached his daughter to become a European champion. Földi earned numerous awards for his results and achievements, most notably he was named Weightlifter of the Century by the International Weightlifting Federation and was elected for Sportsperson of the Nation in Hungary. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Weightlifters Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Bács-Kiskun County
title: Imre Földi
